name: THE HANGING RHINO by Stefano Bombardieri

metadata.name: RHINO #1
metadata.description: The first of 3 collections of 333 NFTs inspired by Stefano Bombardieri's first NFT will be presented and sold. The figure used again is the hanging rhinoceros, and the collection represents the serialization, digitalization and alteration of the reference work through the use of blockchain technology. The NFTs will be characterized by different attributes among them, distinguished by different rarity. Their use will be revealed at the sold-out of the collection, bringing different surprises to collectors and holders of the NFT project.
